## 🆘 紧急程度 / Urgency Level

- [ ] 低 / Low - 不影响基本使用 / Doesn't affect basic functionality
- [ ] 中 / Medium - 影响部分功能 / Affects some features
- [ ] 高 / High - 应用无法正常工作 / App doesn't work properly
- [ ] 紧急 / Critical - 应用崩溃或无法启动 / App crashes or won't start
